full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHONG SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SBYONG BA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LHONGS KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG BA DANG, LHAG PAR LO SNGA PHYIR NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU 'CHED CING, MI SHES PA'I LTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I 'KHU LTOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKONGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR BA BZHIN, ,LAG LEN TU BSTAR SKABS, ,^ BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRAN CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU KLAG CHO GA CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI GNYAN PAS, GAR THOD THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG BAS SNOD MIN LA GSAR SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
